action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X X X X X
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ X
▢ ▢ X X X
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ X
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ X

DESCRIPTION: The grid is 5x5. The entire top row is filled with Xs. The rightmost column is filled with Xs. The middle row (third row) has Xs in the last three cells, and the first two cells are empty (▢). All other cells are empty (▢).

The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:

▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ X
▢ X X X X
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ X
▢ ▢ X ▢ X

DESCRIPTION: A 5x5 grid with Xs forming a solid top row, a solid right column, and a block of Xs in the center of the third row. The rest of the grid is mostly empty except for an X in the center of the bottom row.

This is my DESCRIPTION: The grid is 5x5. The entire top row is filled with Xs. The rightmost column is filled with Xs. The middle row (third row) has Xs in the last three cells, and the first two cells are empty (▢). All other cells are empty (▢).
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my grid that may be different to your grid. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Is there an X in the center cell of the bottom row (row 5, column 3) in your grid?

This is my DESCRIPTION: A 5x5 grid with Xs forming a solid top row, a solid right column, and a block of Xs in the center of the third row. The rest of the grid is mostly empty except for an X in the center of the bottom row.
QUESTION: Is there an X in the center cell of the bottom row (row 5, column 3) in your grid? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my grid that may be different to your grid. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Is there an X in the center cell of the third row (row 3, column 3) in your grid?

ANSWER: No
QUESTION: Is there an X in the center cell of the third row (row 3, column 3) in your grid? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my grid that may be different to your grid. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Are there any Xs in the second row of your grid (row 2)?

ANSWER: Yes
QUESTION: Are there any Xs in the second row of your grid (row 2)? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my grid that may be different to your grid. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Are there any Xs in the first four columns of the bottom row (row 5, columns 1-4) in your grid?

ANSWER: Yes
QUESTION: Are there any Xs in the first four columns of the bottom row (row 5, columns 1-4) in your grid? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my grid that may be different to your grid. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Are there any Xs in the second row of your grid (row 2) outside of the last column (column 5)?

ANSWER: No
QUESTION: Are there any Xs in the second row of your grid (row 2) outside of the last column (column 5)? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my grid that may be different to your grid. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Are there any Xs in the third row of your grid (row 3) outside of columns 3, 4, and 5?

ANSWER: No
QUESTION: Are there any Xs in the third row of your grid (row 3) outside of columns 3, 4, and 5? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.

Now come to a decision. What do you think: are your grid and the other grid described the same?  Write "DECISION: same grid" if you think they are the same grid or "DECISION: different grids" if you think they are different grids. Do not add anything else.
